Description: REVEREND SIX GUN III w/HEAVY PADDED GIG BAG & UPGRADED TUNERS Very good condition! Rare find! Up for sale from my personal collection is this Reverend Six Gun III with the very hard-to-find "David Gilmour Black Strat" color scheme (black body, black pickguard, maple fretboard, white pickups). The stock pickups are excellent, and the effective tone controls (low pass and bass contour) will let you take advantage of their brightness and body to get EXACTLY the strat-style tone you are looking for, every time. It has a pro setup with fresh D'Addario 10-46 strings, and I upgraded the stock tuners to Gotoh magnum locking tuners. Other than that, it's all stock. I strive for accuracy when I photograph a guitar, and I feel a little guilty about this one, because the photos make it look like this picture is near-mint condition. In reality, there are a lot of light swirl and pick marks, and a couple of very minor dings that I simply could not capture in photographs, no matter the lighting or angle. But the truth is, it is a proven workhorse, it is a very handsome guitar, and if you know your David Gilmour, then (like me) you'll have a hard time passing this one up. It plays, sounds, and looks amazing! I am including a very nice Levy's heavy padded gig bag with roomy pockets, sturdy canvas handles and straps, and interior neck support. I think you will really like this gig bag. There is some minor fret wear, shown accurately in photo #4. Will ship FedEx Ground. Please let me know if you have any questions. Just a killer guitar. BUY IT NOW! About the Seller - CACHE VALLEY GUITAR Buy with confidence – my 100% positive feedback and outstanding "Detailed Seller Ratings" speak for themselves! That means you can trust the description of this item to be accurate, and you can trust me to be prompt, professional, responsible, and honest. I show my appreciation for your business by giving you the kind of exceptional service that I would want as a buyer. Best of all, I ship FAST! Here's how buying with me works:IMMEDIATE PAYMENT IS REQUIRED for this item. Because this is a "Buy it Now" listing, immediate payment is expected. PayPal or any of the eBay immediate payment options are fine. SHIPPING: Your package will ship within 1 business day of cleared payment by FedEx Ground. You'll receive an email with tracking information to notify you when your package has shipped. You will also be able to find tracking info in your My eBay purchase history. INTERNATIONAL: No shipping on this item outside of the 48 continental United States. USED ITEM RETURN POLICY: We will allow a return window of 72 hours after delivery with NO restocking fee. After that, we will accept returns within 30 days of receipt with a 25% restocking fee. Returns will not be accepted after 30 days for any reason whatsoever. Any return not received in like condition will be assessed a minimum $100 damage fee in addition to any applicable restocking fee. In other words, I want you to be very happy with your purchase (and I am confident you will be). But my name ain't Wal-Mart, and I won't be treated like it, either. Title: REVEREND SIX GUN III Black Maple Fretboard w/ heavy padded gig bag, Gotoh tuners
